mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question(title, content, qna_category_id, member_id, item_group_id, hide, type) values (#{title},#{content},#{qnaCategoryId}, #{memberId},#{itemGroupId},#{hide},#{type})
mapper.update: update question set question_id=#{questionId}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, created_at=#{createdAt}, updated_at=#{updatedAt}, qna_category_id=#{qnaCategoryId}, member_id=#{memberId}, item_group_id=#{itemGroupId}, hide=#{hide} type=#{type} where question_id=#{questionId}
mapper.select: SELECT title, content FROM question WHERE item_group_id IN ( SELECT item_group_id FROM item_group WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} ) ORDER BY sales_volume DESC
SELECT item_group_id, title, member_id, created_at FROM question WHERE item_group_id in ( SELECT item_group_id FROM item_group WHERE seller_id=#{sellerId}) ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT title, created_at FROM question WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at desc
SELECT * FROM question WHERE type = 'CUSTOMER' ORDER BY question_id DESC LIMIT (#{currentPage} - 1) * #{pageSize}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question WHERE type = 'CUSTOMER'
